items.name: Echo Crystal
items.description: A radiant crystal pulsating with ancient energy.
items.image: A glowing, multi-faceted crystal emitting a soft light, held aloft on a dark, solid background. The crystal appears ancient and mystical, with intricate patterns etched into its surface, reminiscent of arcane symbols.

items.name: Temple Map
items.description: A worn parchment map, detailing the labyrinthine corridors of the Temple of Shadows.
items.image: An old, slightly tattered parchment map on a dark background. It shows a complex maze of corridors and rooms, with faded markings and symbols in an ancient script. The edges of the map are frayed, adding to its ancient and mysterious appearance.

items.name: Ancient Tome
items.description: A dusty tome filled with forgotten knowledge and arcane secrets.
items.image: A thick, leather-bound book with weathered pages, resting on a dark background. The cover is embossed with mysterious symbols and runes, and a faint golden glow emanates from between the slightly ajar pages, suggesting magical content within.

items.name: Small Knife
items.description: A handy, sharp knife essential for survival in the wilderness.
items.image: A small but sturdy knife with a wooden handle and a gleaming, sharp blade, displayed on a dark background. The knife is simple in design, practical for various survival tasks, and has a leather sheath attached to its handle.

items.name: Onion
items.description: A basic yet vital ingredient for cooking and sustenance.
items.image: A fresh, round onion with a shiny, papery skin, sitting on a dark background. The onion is depicted with its natural textures and layers visible, and its top has a few sprouting green shoots, indicating freshness.

items.name: Medicinal Herbs
items.description: A bundle of herbs known for their healing properties.
items.image: A collection of various green herbs tied together with a twine, against a dark background. The herbs have different textures and leaf shapes, suggesting a variety of medicinal uses, and some small flowers are visible among the leaves.
